title: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta...
synopsis: Most people would prefer being the protagonist of a world full of adventure, be it in a game or in another world. But, unfortunately, a certain girl is not so lucky. Regaining the memories of her past life, she realizes that she was reborn in the world of Fortune Loverâ€”one of the games she used to play.
